radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echogenicity, without focal lesions. There is normal hepatopetal flow in the portal vein. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilation. The common duct measures 6 mm. Gallbladder is normal without stones, sludge, wall edema, or pericholecystic fluid. Ultrasonographic ___ sign is negative. Partially imaged in the upper pole of the right kidney is a 6.8 cm cyst, with single thin internal septation.
Showed diverticula but was negative for obstruction and colitis.
